About.title: Keven Goulart
About.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
About.presentation: Hello! I am looking for an opportunity to grow as a professional. I work as a developer specialized in TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, and Nest.js among other technologies.
About.experience: I have experience in developing complete applications, working on both the front-end and back-end, focusing on scalable and well-structured solutions.

ClassicRedirect.linkText: Prefer the normal style? Click here

Presentation.description: Hello! My name is Kéven Goulart Medeiros, and I work as a developer specializing in TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, and Nest. I have experience in building full-stack applications, working on both front-end and back-end development, with a focus on scalable and well-structured solutions

ProjectsClassic.title: Projects
ProjectsClassic.geeklogDescription: A social platform I developed for reviewing and sharing different types of media — such as movies, tv shows, books, games and others — with friends
ProjectsClassic.geeklogTech: Technologies used: NextJS, NestJS, TailwindCSS, Typescript, MongoDB, Prisma, Redis, Docker, etc.
ProjectsClassic.dtMoneyDescription: A website designed to help you easily track and manage your income and expenses
ProjectsClassic.pokeGuesserDescription: Small game to guess the names of Pokémon
ProjectsClassic.pokeGuesserTech: Technologies used: NestJS, TailwindCSS, Typescript, Prisma, Docker, Postgres, NestJS
ProjectsClassic.typeBattleDescription: Online game to compete in real time with another person to see who types the displayed words the fastest — the first to complete all 10 words wins.
ProjectsClassic.typeBattleTech: Technologies used: NextJS, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, WebSocket.
ProjectsClassic.otherProjectsDescription: You can check out my other projects on my GitHub profile.

Doom.title: But can this portfolio run Doom? Yes, yes it can
